p: The relative stereochemistry of substituents of compound 56 was established through NOESY spatial correlations. Protons H6, H11, H12 and H13 correlated together indicating a cis stereochemistry of H6 and the isopropyl group. Similarly, H7 correlated with H8 leading to the cis stereochemistry of the isopropyl group and the hydroxyl function. Coupling constants of H6 (11.0 Hz) and H7 (11.0 and 4.3 Hz) are in agreement with NOESY correlations. Therefore, compound 56 is cadina-1(10),4-dien-8Î²-ol ( Figure 3).
